[align=center][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=5002443][img]https://i.imgur.com/EEflOvL.png[/img][/url][/align]

[color=#ffffff][b]HF BUG BOUNTY PROGRAM[/b][/color]
Members will be awarded $1000 in BTC for a working SQL injection exploit that gains access to the database for a dump. Proof would be required before claiming the reward. This is a great way to assist in improving the security of the site and our members as well as a good opportunity to line your pockets with some cash. For further details, check out [url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6244277][i]this thread.[/i][/url]

[color=#ffffff][b]NO MORE EGG LOTTERIES[/b][/color]
After several months of users egg farming in sub-forums to farm bytes in the Lottery, the ability to create Egg Lotteries has been removed. At this time only lotteries for Î²ytes can be made. You can read more about this change by clicking [url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6243566][i]here.[/i][/url]

[color=#ffffff][b]V3NDORS GET A GLOW UP[/b][/color]
The Vendor upgrade group has received a new update to the official userbar.  [mention=1] recently announced that he has replaced the original iteration of the design with a new animated version that users would find more appealing. Just another reason to work towards obtaining a Vendor upgrade. If you're currently Ub3r and active within the Marketplace, feel free to apply for Vendor by following [i][url=https://hackforums.net/vendorapply.php]this link.[/url][/i]

[align=center][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=5002443][img]https://i.imgur.com/904SqMN.png[/img][/url][/align]

[color=#ffffff][b]HF NEWS SUPPORT CONTEST[/b][/color]
Every single month there will be an ongoing contest within the same thread which will reward members with a cash prize for showing support for the Hack Forums News. Users will be asked to simply wear the HF News Support signature for the duration of each month in order to be eligible to enter. The current prize listed is at $50 Crypto or Paypal, but users also have the option to swap out the cash for an on-site donation award or upgrade. You can read more about this long-term contest hosted by Scribe within the thread listed [url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6243111][i]here.[/i][/url]

[color=#ffffff][b]DISCORD IN PROFILES[/b][/color]
Recently, Discord made some changes to usernames, with this change the # tags have been removed and users are urged to update their usernames to correspond with these updates. With this,  [mention=1]  decided to wipe all Discord usernames from HF profiles to allow users to edit their existing ones through Discord before updating their HF profiles with their new one. You can read more about this update [url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6244207][i]here.[/i][/url]

[color=#ffffff][b]PERMANENT SALES TAGS[/b][/color]
[mention=1] is currently looking for feedback from the community about potentially making permanent sales tags available for purchase. Feel free to join the discussion and share your thoughts on pricing and availability by following [url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6245252][i]this link.[/i][/url]

[hr]

[align=center][b][color=#ffffff]SUPPORT THE HF NEWS[/color][/b]

If you would like to support Scribe and Writ3rs, feel free to wear our support signature. If you decide to wear the [url=https://hackforums.net/usercp.php?action=editsig]signature[/url] you will be entered into a drawing where we will select one supporter and award them [color=#20d342][b]$50[/b][/color] whenever the next edition is released.
This offer is exclusively for upgraded members only. 

To enter, follow the instructions listed in the contest thread: [url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6243111&pid=61987181#pid61987181][b][NEW WINNER MONTHLY] Scribe | Hack Forums News | $50 Drawing[/b][/url][/align]
